title: Sidewall, 1971-82-12, 1860–80
creditline: Gift of Antiquarian and Landmarks Society, Inc.
description: Stripe design with 2 light-colored broad bands and 2 darker narrow bands.  The wide bands contain 2 alternating motifs: a group of flowers, with foliage and wheat, and a vase with a bouquet of flowers.  Printed in white and light gray  with metallic gold sprigs.  The narrow bands contain intertwined vines forming a guilloche pattern with a bird in the center. Printed with white and gold highlights.
